sentences.sContent: The photograph was taken by William Henry Fox Talbot, the inventor of the negative / positive photographic process.
sentences.sContent_eng: The photograph was taken by William Henry Fox Talbot, the inventor of the negative / positive photographic process.
sentences.sCn: 这张照片是由威廉·亨利·福克斯·塔尔博特摄制，他是负片/正片摄影过程的发明者。
